chapter.title: Develop new predicate detection algorithm
chapter.para: This chapter is for developers who use MIPA.

sect1.title: How to write a non-checker process?
sect1.para: This section describes interfaces which the non-checker process can access. Steps of creating a new non-checker process will be presented here.

sect1.title: How to write a checker process?
